00032 static const __m128 GLM_VAR_USED _m128_rad_ps = _mm_set_ps1(3.141592653589793238462643383279f / 180.f);
00033 static const __m128 GLM_VAR_USED _m128_deg_ps = _mm_set_ps1(180.f / 3.141592653589793238462643383279f);
00034 
00035 template <typename matType>
00036 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER matType sse_comp_mul_ps
00037 (
00038         __m128 const in1[4],
00039         __m128 const in2[4],
00040         __m128 out[4]
00041 )
00042 {
00043         out[0] = _mm_mul_ps(in1[0], in2[0]);
00044         out[1] = _mm_mul_ps(in1[1], in2[1]);
00045         out[2] = _mm_mul_ps(in1[2], in2[2]);
00046         out[3] = _mm_mul_ps(in1[3], in2[3]);
00047 }
00048 
00049 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER void sse_add_ps(__m128 const in1[4], __m128 const in2[4], __m128 out[4])
00050 {
00051         {
00052                 out[0] = _mm_add_ps(in1[0], in2[0]);
00053                 out[1] = _mm_add_ps(in1[1], in2[1]);
00054                 out[2] = _mm_add_ps(in1[2], in2[2]);
00055                 out[3] = _mm_add_ps(in1[3], in2[3]);
00056         }
00057 }
00058 
00059 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER void sse_sub_ps(__m128 const in1[4], __m128 const in2[4], __m128 out[4])
00060 {
00061         {
00062                 out[0] = _mm_sub_ps(in1[0], in2[0]);
00063                 out[1] = _mm_sub_ps(in1[1], in2[1]);
00064                 out[2] = _mm_sub_ps(in1[2], in2[2]);
00065                 out[3] = _mm_sub_ps(in1[3], in2[3]);
00066         }
00067 }
00068 
00069 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER __m128 sse_mul_ps(__m128 const m[4], __m128 v)
00070 {
00071         __m128 v0 = _mm_shuffle_ps(v, v, _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00072         __m128 v1 = _mm_shuffle_ps(v, v, _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 1, 1));
00073         __m128 v2 = _mm_shuffle_ps(v, v, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 2));
00074         __m128 v3 = _mm_shuffle_ps(v, v, _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 3, 3));
00075 
00076         __m128 m0 = _mm_mul_ps(m[0], v0);
00077         __m128 m1 = _mm_mul_ps(m[1], v1);
00078         __m128 m2 = _mm_mul_ps(m[2], v2);
00079         __m128 m3 = _mm_mul_ps(m[3], v3);
00080 
00081         __m128 a0 = _mm_add_ps(m0, m1);
00082         __m128 a1 = _mm_add_ps(m2, m3);
00083         __m128 a2 = _mm_add_ps(a0, a1);
00084 
00085         return a2;
00086 }
00087 
00088 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER __m128 sse_mul_ps(__m128 v, __m128 const m[4])
00089 {
00090         __m128 i0 = m[0];
00091         __m128 i1 = m[1];
00092         __m128 i2 = m[2];
00093         __m128 i3 = m[3];
00094 
00095         __m128 m0 = _mm_mul_ps(v, i0);
00096         __m128 m1 = _mm_mul_ps(v, i1);
00097         __m128 m2 = _mm_mul_ps(v, i2);
00098         __m128 m3 = _mm_mul_ps(v, i3);
00099 
00100         __m128 u0 = _mm_unpacklo_ps(m0, m1);
00101         __m128 u1 = _mm_unpackhi_ps(m0, m1);
00102         __m128 a0 = _mm_add_ps(u0, u1);
00103 
00104         __m128 u2 = _mm_unpacklo_ps(m2, m3);
00105         __m128 u3 = _mm_unpackhi_ps(m2, m3);
00106         __m128 a1 = _mm_add_ps(u2, u3);
00107 
00108         __m128 f0 = _mm_movelh_ps(a0, a1);
00109         __m128 f1 = _mm_movehl_ps(a1, a0);
00110         __m128 f2 = _mm_add_ps(f0, f1);
00111 
00112         return f2;
00113 }
00114 
00115 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER void sse_mul_ps(__m128 const in1[4], __m128 const in2[4], __m128 out[4])
00116 {
00117         {
00118                 __m128 e0 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in2[0], in2[0], _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00119                 __m128 e1 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in2[0], in2[0], _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 1, 1));
00120                 __m128 e2 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in2[0], in2[0], _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 2));
00121                 __m128 e3 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in2[0], in2[0], _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 3, 3));
00122 
00123                 __m128 m0 = _mm_mul_ps(in1[0], e0);
00124                 __m128 m1 = _mm_mul_ps(in1[1], e1);
00125                 __m128 m2 = _mm_mul_ps(in1[2], e2);
00126                 __m128 m3 = _mm_mul_ps(in1[3], e3);
00127 
00128                 __m128 a0 = _mm_add_ps(m0, m1);
00129                 __m128 a1 = _mm_add_ps(m2, m3);
00130                 __m128 a2 = _mm_add_ps(a0, a1);
00131 
00132                 out[0] = a2;
00133         }
00134 
00135         {
00136                 __m128 e0 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in2[1], in2[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00137                 __m128 e1 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in2[1], in2[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 1, 1));
00138                 __m128 e2 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in2[1], in2[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 2));
00139                 __m128 e3 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in2[1], in2[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 3, 3));
00140 
00141                 __m128 m0 = _mm_mul_ps(in1[0], e0);
00142                 __m128 m1 = _mm_mul_ps(in1[1], e1);
00143                 __m128 m2 = _mm_mul_ps(in1[2], e2);
00144                 __m128 m3 = _mm_mul_ps(in1[3], e3);
00145 
00146                 __m128 a0 = _mm_add_ps(m0, m1);
00147                 __m128 a1 = _mm_add_ps(m2, m3);
00148                 __m128 a2 = _mm_add_ps(a0, a1);
00149 
00150                 out[1] = a2;
00151         }
00152 
00153         {
00154                 __m128 e0 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in2[2], in2[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00155                 __m128 e1 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in2[2], in2[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 1, 1));
00156                 __m128 e2 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in2[2], in2[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 2));
00157                 __m128 e3 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in2[2], in2[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 3, 3));
00158 
00159                 __m128 m0 = _mm_mul_ps(in1[0], e0);
00160                 __m128 m1 = _mm_mul_ps(in1[1], e1);
00161                 __m128 m2 = _mm_mul_ps(in1[2], e2);
00162                 __m128 m3 = _mm_mul_ps(in1[3], e3);
00163 
00164                 __m128 a0 = _mm_add_ps(m0, m1);
00165                 __m128 a1 = _mm_add_ps(m2, m3);
00166                 __m128 a2 = _mm_add_ps(a0, a1);
00167 
00168                 out[2] = a2;
00169         }
00170 
00171         {
00172                 //(__m128&)_mm_shuffle_epi32(__m128i&)in2[0], _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 3, 3))
00173                 __m128 e0 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in2[3], in2[3], _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00174                 __m128 e1 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in2[3], in2[3], _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 1, 1));
00175                 __m128 e2 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in2[3], in2[3], _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 2));
00176                 __m128 e3 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in2[3], in2[3], _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 3, 3));
00177 
00178                 __m128 m0 = _mm_mul_ps(in1[0], e0);
00179                 __m128 m1 = _mm_mul_ps(in1[1], e1);
00180                 __m128 m2 = _mm_mul_ps(in1[2], e2);
00181                 __m128 m3 = _mm_mul_ps(in1[3], e3);
00182 
00183                 __m128 a0 = _mm_add_ps(m0, m1);
00184                 __m128 a1 = _mm_add_ps(m2, m3);
00185                 __m128 a2 = _mm_add_ps(a0, a1);
00186 
00187                 out[3] = a2;
00188         }
00189 }

00191 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER void sse_transpose_ps(__m128 const in[4], __m128 out[4])
00192 {
00193     __m128 tmp0 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[0], in[1], 0x44);
00194     __m128 tmp2 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[0], in[1], 0xEE);
00195     __m128 tmp1 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[3], 0x44);
00196     __m128 tmp3 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[3], 0xEE);
00197 
00198     out[0] = _mm_shuffle_ps(tmp0, tmp1, 0x88);
00199     out[1] = _mm_shuffle_ps(tmp0, tmp1, 0xDD);
00200     out[2] = _mm_shuffle_ps(tmp2, tmp3, 0x88);
00201     out[3] = _mm_shuffle_ps(tmp2, tmp3, 0xDD);
00202 }

00204 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER __m128 sse_slow_det_ps(__m128 const in[4])
00205 {
00206         __m128 Fac0;
00207         {
00208                 //      valType SubFactor00 = m[2][2] * m[3][3] - m[3][2] * m[2][3];
00209                 //      valType SubFactor00 = m[2][2] * m[3][3] - m[3][2] * m[2][3];
00210                 //      valType SubFactor06 = m[1][2] * m[3][3] - m[3][2] * m[1][3];
00211                 //      valType SubFactor13 = m[1][2] * m[2][3] - m[2][2] * m[1][3];
00212 
00213                 __m128 Swp0a = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 3, 3));
00214                 __m128 Swp0b = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 2));
00215 
00216                 __m128 Swp00 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 2));
00217                 __m128 Swp01 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0a, Swp0a, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00218                 __m128 Swp02 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0b, Swp0b, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00219                 __m128 Swp03 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 3, 3));
00220 
00221                 __m128 Mul00 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp00, Swp01);
00222                 __m128 Mul01 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp02, Swp03);
00223                 Fac0 = _mm_sub_ps(Mul00, Mul01);
00224         }
00225 
00226         __m128 Fac1;
00227         {
00228                 //      valType SubFactor01 = m[2][1] * m[3][3] - m[3][1] * m[2][3];
00229                 //      valType SubFactor01 = m[2][1] * m[3][3] - m[3][1] * m[2][3];
00230                 //      valType SubFactor07 = m[1][1] * m[3][3] - m[3][1] * m[1][3];
00231                 //      valType SubFactor14 = m[1][1] * m[2][3] - m[2][1] * m[1][3];
00232 
00233                 __m128 Swp0a = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 3, 3));
00234                 __m128 Swp0b = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 1, 1));
00235 
00236                 __m128 Swp00 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 1, 1));
00237                 __m128 Swp01 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0a, Swp0a, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00238                 __m128 Swp02 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0b, Swp0b, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00239                 __m128 Swp03 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 3, 3));
00240 
00241                 __m128 Mul00 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp00, Swp01);
00242                 __m128 Mul01 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp02, Swp03);
00243                 Fac1 = _mm_sub_ps(Mul00, Mul01);
00244         }
00245 
00246 
00247         __m128 Fac2;
00248         {
00249                 //      valType SubFactor02 = m[2][1] * m[3][2] - m[3][1] * m[2][2];
00250                 //      valType SubFactor02 = m[2][1] * m[3][2] - m[3][1] * m[2][2];
00251                 //      valType SubFactor08 = m[1][1] * m[3][2] - m[3][1] * m[1][2];
00252                 //      valType SubFactor15 = m[1][1] * m[2][2] - m[2][1] * m[1][2];
00253 
00254                 __m128 Swp0a = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 2));
00255                 __m128 Swp0b = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 1, 1));
00256 
00257                 __m128 Swp00 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 1, 1));
00258                 __m128 Swp01 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0a, Swp0a, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00259                 __m128 Swp02 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0b, Swp0b, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00260                 __m128 Swp03 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 2));
00261 
00262                 __m128 Mul00 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp00, Swp01);
00263                 __m128 Mul01 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp02, Swp03);
00264                 Fac2 = _mm_sub_ps(Mul00, Mul01);
00265         }
00266 
00267         __m128 Fac3;
00268         {
00269                 //      valType SubFactor03 = m[2][0] * m[3][3] - m[3][0] * m[2][3];
00270                 //      valType SubFactor03 = m[2][0] * m[3][3] - m[3][0] * m[2][3];
00271                 //      valType SubFactor09 = m[1][0] * m[3][3] - m[3][0] * m[1][3];
00272                 //      valType SubFactor16 = m[1][0] * m[2][3] - m[2][0] * m[1][3];
00273 
00274                 __m128 Swp0a = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 3, 3));
00275                 __m128 Swp0b = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00276 
00277                 __m128 Swp00 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00278                 __m128 Swp01 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0a, Swp0a, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00279                 __m128 Swp02 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0b, Swp0b, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00280                 __m128 Swp03 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 3, 3));
00281 
00282                 __m128 Mul00 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp00, Swp01);
00283                 __m128 Mul01 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp02, Swp03);
00284                 Fac3 = _mm_sub_ps(Mul00, Mul01);
00285         }
00286 
00287         __m128 Fac4;
00288         {
00289                 //      valType SubFactor04 = m[2][0] * m[3][2] - m[3][0] * m[2][2];
00290                 //      valType SubFactor04 = m[2][0] * m[3][2] - m[3][0] * m[2][2];
00291                 //      valType SubFactor10 = m[1][0] * m[3][2] - m[3][0] * m[1][2];
00292                 //      valType SubFactor17 = m[1][0] * m[2][2] - m[2][0] * m[1][2];
00293 
00294                 __m128 Swp0a = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 2));
00295                 __m128 Swp0b = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00296 
00297                 __m128 Swp00 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00298                 __m128 Swp01 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0a, Swp0a, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00299                 __m128 Swp02 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0b, Swp0b, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00300                 __m128 Swp03 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 2));
00301 
00302                 __m128 Mul00 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp00, Swp01);
00303                 __m128 Mul01 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp02, Swp03);
00304                 Fac4 = _mm_sub_ps(Mul00, Mul01);
00305         }
00306 
00307         __m128 Fac5;
00308         {
00309                 //      valType SubFactor05 = m[2][0] * m[3][1] - m[3][0] * m[2][1];
00310                 //      valType SubFactor05 = m[2][0] * m[3][1] - m[3][0] * m[2][1];
00311                 //      valType SubFactor12 = m[1][0] * m[3][1] - m[3][0] * m[1][1];
00312                 //      valType SubFactor18 = m[1][0] * m[2][1] - m[2][0] * m[1][1];
00313 
00314                 __m128 Swp0a = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 1, 1));
00315                 __m128 Swp0b = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00316 
00317                 __m128 Swp00 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00318                 __m128 Swp01 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0a, Swp0a, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00319                 __m128 Swp02 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0b, Swp0b, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00320                 __m128 Swp03 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 1, 1));
00321 
00322                 __m128 Mul00 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp00, Swp01);
00323                 __m128 Mul01 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp02, Swp03);
00324                 Fac5 = _mm_sub_ps(Mul00, Mul01);
00325         }
00326 
00327         __m128 SignA = _mm_set_ps( 1.0f,-1.0f, 1.0f,-1.0f);
00328         __m128 SignB = _mm_set_ps(-1.0f, 1.0f,-1.0f, 1.0f);
00329 
00330         // m[1][0]
00331         // m[0][0]
00332         // m[0][0]
00333         // m[0][0]
00334         __m128 Temp0 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[1], in[0], _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00335         __m128 Vec0 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Temp0, Temp0, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 0));
00336 
00337         // m[1][1]
00338         // m[0][1]
00339         // m[0][1]
00340         // m[0][1]
00341         __m128 Temp1 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[1], in[0], _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 1, 1));
00342         __m128 Vec1 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Temp1, Temp1, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 0));
00343 
00344         // m[1][2]
00345         // m[0][2]
00346         // m[0][2]
00347         // m[0][2]
00348         __m128 Temp2 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[1], in[0], _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 2));
00349         __m128 Vec2 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Temp2, Temp2, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 0));
00350 
00351         // m[1][3]
00352         // m[0][3]
00353         // m[0][3]
00354         // m[0][3]
00355         __m128 Temp3 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[1], in[0], _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 3, 3));
00356         __m128 Vec3 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Temp3, Temp3, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 0));
00357 
00358         // col0
00359         // + (Vec1[0] * Fac0[0] - Vec2[0] * Fac1[0] + Vec3[0] * Fac2[0]),
00360         // - (Vec1[1] * Fac0[1] - Vec2[1] * Fac1[1] + Vec3[1] * Fac2[1]),
00361         // + (Vec1[2] * Fac0[2] - Vec2[2] * Fac1[2] + Vec3[2] * Fac2[2]),
00362         // - (Vec1[3] * Fac0[3] - Vec2[3] * Fac1[3] + Vec3[3] * Fac2[3]),
00363         __m128 Mul00 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec1, Fac0);
00364         __m128 Mul01 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec2, Fac1);
00365         __m128 Mul02 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec3, Fac2);
00366         __m128 Sub00 = _mm_sub_ps(Mul00, Mul01);
00367         __m128 Add00 = _mm_add_ps(Sub00, Mul02);
00368         __m128 Inv0 = _mm_mul_ps(SignB, Add00);
00369 
00370         // col1
00371         // - (Vec0[0] * Fac0[0] - Vec2[0] * Fac3[0] + Vec3[0] * Fac4[0]),
00372         // + (Vec0[0] * Fac0[1] - Vec2[1] * Fac3[1] + Vec3[1] * Fac4[1]),
00373         // - (Vec0[0] * Fac0[2] - Vec2[2] * Fac3[2] + Vec3[2] * Fac4[2]),
00374         // + (Vec0[0] * Fac0[3] - Vec2[3] * Fac3[3] + Vec3[3] * Fac4[3]),
00375         __m128 Mul03 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec0, Fac0);
00376         __m128 Mul04 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec2, Fac3);
00377         __m128 Mul05 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec3, Fac4);
00378         __m128 Sub01 = _mm_sub_ps(Mul03, Mul04);
00379         __m128 Add01 = _mm_add_ps(Sub01, Mul05);
00380         __m128 Inv1 = _mm_mul_ps(SignA, Add01);
00381 
00382         // col2
00383         // + (Vec0[0] * Fac1[0] - Vec1[0] * Fac3[0] + Vec3[0] * Fac5[0]),
00384         // - (Vec0[0] * Fac1[1] - Vec1[1] * Fac3[1] + Vec3[1] * Fac5[1]),
00385         // + (Vec0[0] * Fac1[2] - Vec1[2] * Fac3[2] + Vec3[2] * Fac5[2]),
00386         // - (Vec0[0] * Fac1[3] - Vec1[3] * Fac3[3] + Vec3[3] * Fac5[3]),
00387         __m128 Mul06 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec0, Fac1);
00388         __m128 Mul07 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec1, Fac3);
00389         __m128 Mul08 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec3, Fac5);
00390         __m128 Sub02 = _mm_sub_ps(Mul06, Mul07);
00391         __m128 Add02 = _mm_add_ps(Sub02, Mul08);
00392         __m128 Inv2 = _mm_mul_ps(SignB, Add02);
00393 
00394         // col3
00395         // - (Vec1[0] * Fac2[0] - Vec1[0] * Fac4[0] + Vec2[0] * Fac5[0]),
00396         // + (Vec1[0] * Fac2[1] - Vec1[1] * Fac4[1] + Vec2[1] * Fac5[1]),
00397         // - (Vec1[0] * Fac2[2] - Vec1[2] * Fac4[2] + Vec2[2] * Fac5[2]),
00398         // + (Vec1[0] * Fac2[3] - Vec1[3] * Fac4[3] + Vec2[3] * Fac5[3]));
00399         __m128 Mul09 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec0, Fac2);
00400         __m128 Mul10 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec1, Fac4);
00401         __m128 Mul11 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec2, Fac5);
00402         __m128 Sub03 = _mm_sub_ps(Mul09, Mul10);
00403         __m128 Add03 = _mm_add_ps(Sub03, Mul11);
00404         __m128 Inv3 = _mm_mul_ps(SignA, Add03);
00405 
00406         __m128 Row0 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Inv0, Inv1, _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00407         __m128 Row1 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Inv2, Inv3, _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00408         __m128 Row2 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Row0, Row1, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 2, 0));
00409 
00410         //      valType Determinant = m[0][0] * Inverse[0][0]
00411         //                                              + m[0][1] * Inverse[1][0]
00412         //                                              + m[0][2] * Inverse[2][0]
00413         //                                              + m[0][3] * Inverse[3][0];
00414         __m128 Det0 = sse_dot_ps(in[0], Row2);
00415         return Det0;
00416 }
00417 
00418 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER __m128 sse_detd_ps
00419 (
00420         __m128 const m[4]
00421 )
00422 {
00423         // _mm_castsi128_ps(_mm_shuffle_epi32(_mm_castps_si128(
00424 
00425         //T SubFactor00 = m[2][2] * m[3][3] - m[3][2] * m[2][3];
00426         //T SubFactor01 = m[2][1] * m[3][3] - m[3][1] * m[2][3];
00427         //T SubFactor02 = m[2][1] * m[3][2] - m[3][1] * m[2][2];
00428         //T SubFactor03 = m[2][0] * m[3][3] - m[3][0] * m[2][3];
00429         //T SubFactor04 = m[2][0] * m[3][2] - m[3][0] * m[2][2];
00430         //T SubFactor05 = m[2][0] * m[3][1] - m[3][0] * m[2][1];
00431 
00432         // First 2 columns
00433         __m128 Swp2A = _mm_castsi128_ps(_mm_shuffle_epi32(_mm_castps_si128(m[2]), _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 1, 1, 2)));
00434         __m128 Swp3A = _mm_castsi128_ps(_mm_shuffle_epi32(_mm_castps_si128(m[3]), _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 2, 3, 3)));
00435         __m128 MulA = _mm_mul_ps(Swp2A, Swp3A);
00436 
00437         // Second 2 columns
00438         __m128 Swp2B = _mm_castsi128_ps(_mm_shuffle_epi32(_mm_castps_si128(m[2]), _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 2, 3, 3)));
00439         __m128 Swp3B = _mm_castsi128_ps(_mm_shuffle_epi32(_mm_castps_si128(m[3]), _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 1, 1, 2)));
00440         __m128 MulB = _mm_mul_ps(Swp2B, Swp3B);
00441 
00442         // Columns subtraction
00443         __m128 SubE = _mm_sub_ps(MulA, MulB);
00444 
00445         // Last 2 rows
00446         __m128 Swp2C = _mm_castsi128_ps(_mm_shuffle_epi32(_mm_castps_si128(m[2]), _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 1, 2)));
00447         __m128 Swp3C = _mm_castsi128_ps(_mm_shuffle_epi32(_mm_castps_si128(m[3]), _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 2, 0, 0)));
00448         __m128 MulC = _mm_mul_ps(Swp2C, Swp3C);
00449         __m128 SubF = _mm_sub_ps(_mm_movehl_ps(MulC, MulC), MulC);
00450 
00451         //detail::tvec4<T, P> DetCof(
00452         //      + (m[1][1] * SubFactor00 - m[1][2] * SubFactor01 + m[1][3] * SubFactor02),
00453         //      - (m[1][0] * SubFactor00 - m[1][2] * SubFactor03 + m[1][3] * SubFactor04),
00454         //      + (m[1][0] * SubFactor01 - m[1][1] * SubFactor03 + m[1][3] * SubFactor05),
00455         //      - (m[1][0] * SubFactor02 - m[1][1] * SubFactor04 + m[1][2] * SubFactor05));
00456 
00457         __m128 SubFacA = _mm_castsi128_ps(_mm_shuffle_epi32(_mm_castps_si128(SubE), _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 1, 0, 0)));
00458         __m128 SwpFacA = _mm_castsi128_ps(_mm_shuffle_epi32(_mm_castps_si128(m[1]), _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 1)));
00459         __m128 MulFacA = _mm_mul_ps(SwpFacA, SubFacA);
00460 
00461         __m128 SubTmpB = _mm_shuffle_ps(SubE, SubF, _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 3, 1));
00462         __m128 SubFacB = _mm_castsi128_ps(_mm_shuffle_epi32(_mm_castps_si128(SubTmpB), _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 1, 1, 0)));//SubF[0], SubE[3], SubE[3], SubE[1];
00463         __m128 SwpFacB = _mm_castsi128_ps(_mm_shuffle_epi32(_mm_castps_si128(m[1]), _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 2, 2)));
00464         __m128 MulFacB = _mm_mul_ps(SwpFacB, SubFacB);
00465 
00466         __m128 SubRes = _mm_sub_ps(MulFacA, MulFacB);
00467 
00468         __m128 SubTmpC = _mm_shuffle_ps(SubE, SubF, _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 0, 2, 2));
00469         __m128 SubFacC = _mm_castsi128_ps(_mm_shuffle_epi32(_mm_castps_si128(SubTmpC), _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 2, 0)));
00470         __m128 SwpFacC = _mm_castsi128_ps(_mm_shuffle_epi32(_mm_castps_si128(m[1]), _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 3, 3, 3)));
00471         __m128 MulFacC = _mm_mul_ps(SwpFacC, SubFacC);
00472 
00473         __m128 AddRes = _mm_add_ps(SubRes, MulFacC);
00474         __m128 DetCof = _mm_mul_ps(AddRes, _mm_setr_ps( 1.0f,-1.0f, 1.0f,-1.0f));
00475 
00476         //return m[0][0] * DetCof[0]
00477         //       + m[0][1] * DetCof[1]
00478         //       + m[0][2] * DetCof[2]
00479         //       + m[0][3] * DetCof[3];
00480 
00481         return sse_dot_ps(m[0], DetCof);
00482 }
00483 
00484 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER __m128 sse_det_ps
00485 (
00486         __m128 const m[4]
00487 )
00488 {
00489         // _mm_castsi128_ps(_mm_shuffle_epi32(_mm_castps_si128(add)
00490 
00491         //T SubFactor00 = m[2][2] * m[3][3] - m[3][2] * m[2][3];
00492         //T SubFactor01 = m[2][1] * m[3][3] - m[3][1] * m[2][3];
00493         //T SubFactor02 = m[2][1] * m[3][2] - m[3][1] * m[2][2];
00494         //T SubFactor03 = m[2][0] * m[3][3] - m[3][0] * m[2][3];
00495         //T SubFactor04 = m[2][0] * m[3][2] - m[3][0] * m[2][2];
00496         //T SubFactor05 = m[2][0] * m[3][1] - m[3][0] * m[2][1];
00497 
00498         // First 2 columns
00499         __m128 Swp2A = _mm_shuffle_ps(m[2], m[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 1, 1, 2));
00500         __m128 Swp3A = _mm_shuffle_ps(m[3], m[3], _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 2, 3, 3));
00501         __m128 MulA = _mm_mul_ps(Swp2A, Swp3A);
00502 
00503         // Second 2 columns
00504         __m128 Swp2B = _mm_shuffle_ps(m[2], m[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 2, 3, 3));
00505         __m128 Swp3B = _mm_shuffle_ps(m[3], m[3], _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 1, 1, 2));
00506         __m128 MulB = _mm_mul_ps(Swp2B, Swp3B);
00507 
00508         // Columns subtraction
00509         __m128 SubE = _mm_sub_ps(MulA, MulB);
00510 
00511         // Last 2 rows
00512         __m128 Swp2C = _mm_shuffle_ps(m[2], m[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 1, 2));
00513         __m128 Swp3C = _mm_shuffle_ps(m[3], m[3], _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 2, 0, 0));
00514         __m128 MulC = _mm_mul_ps(Swp2C, Swp3C);
00515         __m128 SubF = _mm_sub_ps(_mm_movehl_ps(MulC, MulC), MulC);
00516 
00517         //detail::tvec4<T, P> DetCof(
00518         //      + (m[1][1] * SubFactor00 - m[1][2] * SubFactor01 + m[1][3] * SubFactor02),
00519         //      - (m[1][0] * SubFactor00 - m[1][2] * SubFactor03 + m[1][3] * SubFactor04),
00520         //      + (m[1][0] * SubFactor01 - m[1][1] * SubFactor03 + m[1][3] * SubFactor05),
00521         //      - (m[1][0] * SubFactor02 - m[1][1] * SubFactor04 + m[1][2] * SubFactor05));
00522 
00523         __m128 SubFacA = _mm_shuffle_ps(SubE, SubE, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 1, 0, 0));
00524         __m128 SwpFacA = _mm_shuffle_ps(m[1], m[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 1));
00525         __m128 MulFacA = _mm_mul_ps(SwpFacA, SubFacA);
00526 
00527         __m128 SubTmpB = _mm_shuffle_ps(SubE, SubF, _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 3, 1));
00528         __m128 SubFacB = _mm_shuffle_ps(SubTmpB, SubTmpB, _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 1, 1, 0));//SubF[0], SubE[3], SubE[3], SubE[1];
00529         __m128 SwpFacB = _mm_shuffle_ps(m[1], m[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 2, 2));
00530         __m128 MulFacB = _mm_mul_ps(SwpFacB, SubFacB);
00531 
00532         __m128 SubRes = _mm_sub_ps(MulFacA, MulFacB);
00533 
00534         __m128 SubTmpC = _mm_shuffle_ps(SubE, SubF, _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 0, 2, 2));
00535         __m128 SubFacC = _mm_shuffle_ps(SubTmpC, SubTmpC, _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 2, 0));
00536         __m128 SwpFacC = _mm_shuffle_ps(m[1], m[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 3, 3, 3));
00537         __m128 MulFacC = _mm_mul_ps(SwpFacC, SubFacC);
00538 
00539         __m128 AddRes = _mm_add_ps(SubRes, MulFacC);
00540         __m128 DetCof = _mm_mul_ps(AddRes, _mm_setr_ps( 1.0f,-1.0f, 1.0f,-1.0f));
00541 
00542         //return m[0][0] * DetCof[0]
00543         //       + m[0][1] * DetCof[1]
00544         //       + m[0][2] * DetCof[2]
00545         //       + m[0][3] * DetCof[3];
00546 
00547         return sse_dot_ps(m[0], DetCof);
00548 }
00549 
00550 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER void sse_inverse_ps(__m128 const in[4], __m128 out[4])
00551 {
00552         __m128 Fac0;
00553         {
00554                 //      valType SubFactor00 = m[2][2] * m[3][3] - m[3][2] * m[2][3];
00555                 //      valType SubFactor00 = m[2][2] * m[3][3] - m[3][2] * m[2][3];
00556                 //      valType SubFactor06 = m[1][2] * m[3][3] - m[3][2] * m[1][3];
00557                 //      valType SubFactor13 = m[1][2] * m[2][3] - m[2][2] * m[1][3];
00558 
00559                 __m128 Swp0a = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 3, 3));
00560                 __m128 Swp0b = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 2));
00561 
00562                 __m128 Swp00 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 2));
00563                 __m128 Swp01 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0a, Swp0a, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00564                 __m128 Swp02 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0b, Swp0b, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00565                 __m128 Swp03 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 3, 3));
00566 
00567                 __m128 Mul00 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp00, Swp01);
00568                 __m128 Mul01 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp02, Swp03);
00569                 Fac0 = _mm_sub_ps(Mul00, Mul01);
00570         }
00571 
00572         __m128 Fac1;
00573         {
00574                 //      valType SubFactor01 = m[2][1] * m[3][3] - m[3][1] * m[2][3];
00575                 //      valType SubFactor01 = m[2][1] * m[3][3] - m[3][1] * m[2][3];
00576                 //      valType SubFactor07 = m[1][1] * m[3][3] - m[3][1] * m[1][3];
00577                 //      valType SubFactor14 = m[1][1] * m[2][3] - m[2][1] * m[1][3];
00578 
00579                 __m128 Swp0a = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 3, 3));
00580                 __m128 Swp0b = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 1, 1));
00581 
00582                 __m128 Swp00 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 1, 1));
00583                 __m128 Swp01 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0a, Swp0a, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00584                 __m128 Swp02 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0b, Swp0b, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00585                 __m128 Swp03 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 3, 3));
00586 
00587                 __m128 Mul00 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp00, Swp01);
00588                 __m128 Mul01 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp02, Swp03);
00589                 Fac1 = _mm_sub_ps(Mul00, Mul01);
00590         }
00591 
00592 
00593         __m128 Fac2;
00594         {
00595                 //      valType SubFactor02 = m[2][1] * m[3][2] - m[3][1] * m[2][2];
00596                 //      valType SubFactor02 = m[2][1] * m[3][2] - m[3][1] * m[2][2];
00597                 //      valType SubFactor08 = m[1][1] * m[3][2] - m[3][1] * m[1][2];
00598                 //      valType SubFactor15 = m[1][1] * m[2][2] - m[2][1] * m[1][2];
00599 
00600                 __m128 Swp0a = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 2));
00601                 __m128 Swp0b = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 1, 1));
00602 
00603                 __m128 Swp00 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 1, 1));
00604                 __m128 Swp01 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0a, Swp0a, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00605                 __m128 Swp02 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0b, Swp0b, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00606                 __m128 Swp03 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 2));
00607 
00608                 __m128 Mul00 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp00, Swp01);
00609                 __m128 Mul01 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp02, Swp03);
00610                 Fac2 = _mm_sub_ps(Mul00, Mul01);
00611     }
00612 
00613         __m128 Fac3;
00614         {
00615                 //      valType SubFactor03 = m[2][0] * m[3][3] - m[3][0] * m[2][3];
00616                 //      valType SubFactor03 = m[2][0] * m[3][3] - m[3][0] * m[2][3];
00617                 //      valType SubFactor09 = m[1][0] * m[3][3] - m[3][0] * m[1][3];
00618                 //      valType SubFactor16 = m[1][0] * m[2][3] - m[2][0] * m[1][3];
00619 
00620                 __m128 Swp0a = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 3, 3));
00621                 __m128 Swp0b = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00622 
00623                 __m128 Swp00 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00624                 __m128 Swp01 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0a, Swp0a, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00625                 __m128 Swp02 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0b, Swp0b, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00626                 __m128 Swp03 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 3, 3));
00627 
00628                 __m128 Mul00 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp00, Swp01);
00629                 __m128 Mul01 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp02, Swp03);
00630                 Fac3 = _mm_sub_ps(Mul00, Mul01);
00631         }
00632 
00633         __m128 Fac4;
00634         {
00635                 //      valType SubFactor04 = m[2][0] * m[3][2] - m[3][0] * m[2][2];
00636                 //      valType SubFactor04 = m[2][0] * m[3][2] - m[3][0] * m[2][2];
00637                 //      valType SubFactor10 = m[1][0] * m[3][2] - m[3][0] * m[1][2];
00638                 //      valType SubFactor17 = m[1][0] * m[2][2] - m[2][0] * m[1][2];
00639 
00640                 __m128 Swp0a = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 2));
00641                 __m128 Swp0b = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00642 
00643                 __m128 Swp00 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00644                 __m128 Swp01 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0a, Swp0a, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00645                 __m128 Swp02 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0b, Swp0b, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00646                 __m128 Swp03 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 2));
00647 
00648                 __m128 Mul00 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp00, Swp01);
00649                 __m128 Mul01 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp02, Swp03);
00650                 Fac4 = _mm_sub_ps(Mul00, Mul01);
00651         }
00652 
00653         __m128 Fac5;
00654         {
00655                 //      valType SubFactor05 = m[2][0] * m[3][1] - m[3][0] * m[2][1];
00656                 //      valType SubFactor05 = m[2][0] * m[3][1] - m[3][0] * m[2][1];
00657                 //      valType SubFactor12 = m[1][0] * m[3][1] - m[3][0] * m[1][1];
00658                 //      valType SubFactor18 = m[1][0] * m[2][1] - m[2][0] * m[1][1];
00659 
00660                 __m128 Swp0a = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 1, 1));
00661                 __m128 Swp0b = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00662 
00663                 __m128 Swp00 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00664                 __m128 Swp01 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0a, Swp0a, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00665                 __m128 Swp02 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0b, Swp0b, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00666                 __m128 Swp03 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 1, 1));
00667 
00668                 __m128 Mul00 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp00, Swp01);
00669                 __m128 Mul01 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp02, Swp03);
00670                 Fac5 = _mm_sub_ps(Mul00, Mul01);
00671         }
00672 
00673         __m128 SignA = _mm_set_ps( 1.0f,-1.0f, 1.0f,-1.0f);
00674         __m128 SignB = _mm_set_ps(-1.0f, 1.0f,-1.0f, 1.0f);
00675 
00676         // m[1][0]
00677         // m[0][0]
00678         // m[0][0]
00679         // m[0][0]
00680         __m128 Temp0 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[1], in[0], _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00681         __m128 Vec0 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Temp0, Temp0, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 0));
00682 
00683         // m[1][1]
00684         // m[0][1]
00685         // m[0][1]
00686         // m[0][1]
00687         __m128 Temp1 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[1], in[0], _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 1, 1));
00688         __m128 Vec1 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Temp1, Temp1, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 0));
00689 
00690         // m[1][2]
00691         // m[0][2]
00692         // m[0][2]
00693         // m[0][2]
00694         __m128 Temp2 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[1], in[0], _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 2));
00695         __m128 Vec2 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Temp2, Temp2, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 0));
00696 
00697         // m[1][3]
00698         // m[0][3]
00699         // m[0][3]
00700         // m[0][3]
00701         __m128 Temp3 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[1], in[0], _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 3, 3));
00702         __m128 Vec3 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Temp3, Temp3, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 0));
00703 
00704         // col0
00705         // + (Vec1[0] * Fac0[0] - Vec2[0] * Fac1[0] + Vec3[0] * Fac2[0]),
00706         // - (Vec1[1] * Fac0[1] - Vec2[1] * Fac1[1] + Vec3[1] * Fac2[1]),
00707         // + (Vec1[2] * Fac0[2] - Vec2[2] * Fac1[2] + Vec3[2] * Fac2[2]),
00708         // - (Vec1[3] * Fac0[3] - Vec2[3] * Fac1[3] + Vec3[3] * Fac2[3]),
00709         __m128 Mul00 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec1, Fac0);
00710         __m128 Mul01 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec2, Fac1);
00711         __m128 Mul02 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec3, Fac2);
00712         __m128 Sub00 = _mm_sub_ps(Mul00, Mul01);
00713         __m128 Add00 = _mm_add_ps(Sub00, Mul02);
00714         __m128 Inv0 = _mm_mul_ps(SignB, Add00);
00715 
00716         // col1
00717         // - (Vec0[0] * Fac0[0] - Vec2[0] * Fac3[0] + Vec3[0] * Fac4[0]),
00718         // + (Vec0[0] * Fac0[1] - Vec2[1] * Fac3[1] + Vec3[1] * Fac4[1]),
00719         // - (Vec0[0] * Fac0[2] - Vec2[2] * Fac3[2] + Vec3[2] * Fac4[2]),
00720         // + (Vec0[0] * Fac0[3] - Vec2[3] * Fac3[3] + Vec3[3] * Fac4[3]),
00721         __m128 Mul03 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec0, Fac0);
00722         __m128 Mul04 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec2, Fac3);
00723         __m128 Mul05 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec3, Fac4);
00724         __m128 Sub01 = _mm_sub_ps(Mul03, Mul04);
00725         __m128 Add01 = _mm_add_ps(Sub01, Mul05);
00726         __m128 Inv1 = _mm_mul_ps(SignA, Add01);
00727 
00728         // col2
00729         // + (Vec0[0] * Fac1[0] - Vec1[0] * Fac3[0] + Vec3[0] * Fac5[0]),
00730         // - (Vec0[0] * Fac1[1] - Vec1[1] * Fac3[1] + Vec3[1] * Fac5[1]),
00731         // + (Vec0[0] * Fac1[2] - Vec1[2] * Fac3[2] + Vec3[2] * Fac5[2]),
00732         // - (Vec0[0] * Fac1[3] - Vec1[3] * Fac3[3] + Vec3[3] * Fac5[3]),
00733         __m128 Mul06 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec0, Fac1);
00734         __m128 Mul07 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec1, Fac3);
00735         __m128 Mul08 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec3, Fac5);
00736         __m128 Sub02 = _mm_sub_ps(Mul06, Mul07);
00737         __m128 Add02 = _mm_add_ps(Sub02, Mul08);
00738         __m128 Inv2 = _mm_mul_ps(SignB, Add02);
00739 
00740         // col3
00741         // - (Vec1[0] * Fac2[0] - Vec1[0] * Fac4[0] + Vec2[0] * Fac5[0]),
00742         // + (Vec1[0] * Fac2[1] - Vec1[1] * Fac4[1] + Vec2[1] * Fac5[1]),
00743         // - (Vec1[0] * Fac2[2] - Vec1[2] * Fac4[2] + Vec2[2] * Fac5[2]),
00744         // + (Vec1[0] * Fac2[3] - Vec1[3] * Fac4[3] + Vec2[3] * Fac5[3]));
00745         __m128 Mul09 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec0, Fac2);
00746         __m128 Mul10 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec1, Fac4);
00747         __m128 Mul11 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec2, Fac5);
00748         __m128 Sub03 = _mm_sub_ps(Mul09, Mul10);
00749         __m128 Add03 = _mm_add_ps(Sub03, Mul11);
00750         __m128 Inv3 = _mm_mul_ps(SignA, Add03);
00751 
00752         __m128 Row0 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Inv0, Inv1, _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00753         __m128 Row1 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Inv2, Inv3, _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00754         __m128 Row2 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Row0, Row1, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 2, 0));
00755 
00756         //      valType Determinant = m[0][0] * Inverse[0][0] 
00757         //                                              + m[0][1] * Inverse[1][0] 
00758         //                                              + m[0][2] * Inverse[2][0] 
00759         //                                              + m[0][3] * Inverse[3][0];
00760         __m128 Det0 = sse_dot_ps(in[0], Row2);
00761         __m128 Rcp0 = _mm_div_ps(one, Det0);
00762         //__m128 Rcp0 = _mm_rcp_ps(Det0);
00763 
00764         //      Inverse /= Determinant;
00765         out[0] = _mm_mul_ps(Inv0, Rcp0);
00766         out[1] = _mm_mul_ps(Inv1, Rcp0);
00767         out[2] = _mm_mul_ps(Inv2, Rcp0);
00768         out[3] = _mm_mul_ps(Inv3, Rcp0);
00769 }
00770 
00771 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER void sse_inverse_fast_ps(__m128 const in[4], __m128 out[4])
00772 {
00773         __m128 Fac0;
00774         {
00775                 //      valType SubFactor00 = m[2][2] * m[3][3] - m[3][2] * m[2][3];
00776                 //      valType SubFactor00 = m[2][2] * m[3][3] - m[3][2] * m[2][3];
00777                 //      valType SubFactor06 = m[1][2] * m[3][3] - m[3][2] * m[1][3];
00778                 //      valType SubFactor13 = m[1][2] * m[2][3] - m[2][2] * m[1][3];
00779 
00780                 __m128 Swp0a = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 3, 3));
00781                 __m128 Swp0b = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 2));
00782 
00783                 __m128 Swp00 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 2));
00784                 __m128 Swp01 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0a, Swp0a, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00785                 __m128 Swp02 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0b, Swp0b, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00786                 __m128 Swp03 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 3, 3));
00787 
00788                 __m128 Mul00 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp00, Swp01);
00789                 __m128 Mul01 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp02, Swp03);
00790                 Fac0 = _mm_sub_ps(Mul00, Mul01);
00791         }
00792 
00793         __m128 Fac1;
00794         {
00795                 //      valType SubFactor01 = m[2][1] * m[3][3] - m[3][1] * m[2][3];
00796                 //      valType SubFactor01 = m[2][1] * m[3][3] - m[3][1] * m[2][3];
00797                 //      valType SubFactor07 = m[1][1] * m[3][3] - m[3][1] * m[1][3];
00798                 //      valType SubFactor14 = m[1][1] * m[2][3] - m[2][1] * m[1][3];
00799 
00800                 __m128 Swp0a = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 3, 3));
00801                 __m128 Swp0b = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 1, 1));
00802 
00803                 __m128 Swp00 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 1, 1));
00804                 __m128 Swp01 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0a, Swp0a, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00805                 __m128 Swp02 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0b, Swp0b, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00806                 __m128 Swp03 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 3, 3));
00807 
00808                 __m128 Mul00 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp00, Swp01);
00809                 __m128 Mul01 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp02, Swp03);
00810                 Fac1 = _mm_sub_ps(Mul00, Mul01);
00811         }
00812 
00813 
00814         __m128 Fac2;
00815         {
00816                 //      valType SubFactor02 = m[2][1] * m[3][2] - m[3][1] * m[2][2];
00817                 //      valType SubFactor02 = m[2][1] * m[3][2] - m[3][1] * m[2][2];
00818                 //      valType SubFactor08 = m[1][1] * m[3][2] - m[3][1] * m[1][2];
00819                 //      valType SubFactor15 = m[1][1] * m[2][2] - m[2][1] * m[1][2];
00820 
00821                 __m128 Swp0a = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 2));
00822                 __m128 Swp0b = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 1, 1));
00823 
00824                 __m128 Swp00 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 1, 1));
00825                 __m128 Swp01 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0a, Swp0a, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00826                 __m128 Swp02 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0b, Swp0b, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00827                 __m128 Swp03 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 2));
00828 
00829                 __m128 Mul00 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp00, Swp01);
00830                 __m128 Mul01 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp02, Swp03);
00831                 Fac2 = _mm_sub_ps(Mul00, Mul01);
00832         }
00833 
00834         __m128 Fac3;
00835         {
00836                 //      valType SubFactor03 = m[2][0] * m[3][3] - m[3][0] * m[2][3];
00837                 //      valType SubFactor03 = m[2][0] * m[3][3] - m[3][0] * m[2][3];
00838                 //      valType SubFactor09 = m[1][0] * m[3][3] - m[3][0] * m[1][3];
00839                 //      valType SubFactor16 = m[1][0] * m[2][3] - m[2][0] * m[1][3];
00840 
00841                 __m128 Swp0a = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 3, 3));
00842                 __m128 Swp0b = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00843 
00844                 __m128 Swp00 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00845                 __m128 Swp01 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0a, Swp0a, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00846                 __m128 Swp02 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0b, Swp0b, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00847                 __m128 Swp03 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 3, 3));
00848 
00849                 __m128 Mul00 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp00, Swp01);
00850                 __m128 Mul01 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp02, Swp03);
00851                 Fac3 = _mm_sub_ps(Mul00, Mul01);
00852         }
00853 
00854         __m128 Fac4;
00855         {
00856                 //      valType SubFactor04 = m[2][0] * m[3][2] - m[3][0] * m[2][2];
00857                 //      valType SubFactor04 = m[2][0] * m[3][2] - m[3][0] * m[2][2];
00858                 //      valType SubFactor10 = m[1][0] * m[3][2] - m[3][0] * m[1][2];
00859                 //      valType SubFactor17 = m[1][0] * m[2][2] - m[2][0] * m[1][2];
00860 
00861                 __m128 Swp0a = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 2));
00862                 __m128 Swp0b = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00863 
00864                 __m128 Swp00 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00865                 __m128 Swp01 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0a, Swp0a, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00866                 __m128 Swp02 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0b, Swp0b, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00867                 __m128 Swp03 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 2));
00868 
00869                 __m128 Mul00 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp00, Swp01);
00870                 __m128 Mul01 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp02, Swp03);
00871                 Fac4 = _mm_sub_ps(Mul00, Mul01);
00872         }
00873 
00874         __m128 Fac5;
00875         {
00876                 //      valType SubFactor05 = m[2][0] * m[3][1] - m[3][0] * m[2][1];
00877                 //      valType SubFactor05 = m[2][0] * m[3][1] - m[3][0] * m[2][1];
00878                 //      valType SubFactor12 = m[1][0] * m[3][1] - m[3][0] * m[1][1];
00879                 //      valType SubFactor18 = m[1][0] * m[2][1] - m[2][0] * m[1][1];
00880 
00881                 __m128 Swp0a = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 1, 1));
00882                 __m128 Swp0b = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[3], in[2], _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00883 
00884                 __m128 Swp00 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00885                 __m128 Swp01 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0a, Swp0a, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00886                 __m128 Swp02 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Swp0b, Swp0b, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 0, 0));
00887                 __m128 Swp03 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[2], in[1], _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 1, 1));
00888 
00889                 __m128 Mul00 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp00, Swp01);
00890                 __m128 Mul01 = _mm_mul_ps(Swp02, Swp03);
00891                 Fac5 = _mm_sub_ps(Mul00, Mul01);
00892         }
00893 
00894         __m128 SignA = _mm_set_ps( 1.0f,-1.0f, 1.0f,-1.0f);
00895         __m128 SignB = _mm_set_ps(-1.0f, 1.0f,-1.0f, 1.0f);
00896 
00897         // m[1][0]
00898         // m[0][0]
00899         // m[0][0]
00900         // m[0][0]
00901         __m128 Temp0 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[1], in[0], _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00902         __m128 Vec0 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Temp0, Temp0, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 0));
00903 
00904         // m[1][1]
00905         // m[0][1]
00906         // m[0][1]
00907         // m[0][1]
00908         __m128 Temp1 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[1], in[0], _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 1, 1));
00909         __m128 Vec1 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Temp1, Temp1, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 0));
00910 
00911         // m[1][2]
00912         // m[0][2]
00913         // m[0][2]
00914         // m[0][2]
00915         __m128 Temp2 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[1], in[0], _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 2));
00916         __m128 Vec2 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Temp2, Temp2, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 0));
00917 
00918         // m[1][3]
00919         // m[0][3]
00920         // m[0][3]
00921         // m[0][3]
00922         __m128 Temp3 = _mm_shuffle_ps(in[1], in[0], _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 3, 3));
00923         __m128 Vec3 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Temp3, Temp3, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 0));
00924 
00925         // col0
00926         // + (Vec1[0] * Fac0[0] - Vec2[0] * Fac1[0] + Vec3[0] * Fac2[0]),
00927         // - (Vec1[1] * Fac0[1] - Vec2[1] * Fac1[1] + Vec3[1] * Fac2[1]),
00928         // + (Vec1[2] * Fac0[2] - Vec2[2] * Fac1[2] + Vec3[2] * Fac2[2]),
00929         // - (Vec1[3] * Fac0[3] - Vec2[3] * Fac1[3] + Vec3[3] * Fac2[3]),
00930         __m128 Mul00 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec1, Fac0);
00931         __m128 Mul01 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec2, Fac1);
00932         __m128 Mul02 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec3, Fac2);
00933         __m128 Sub00 = _mm_sub_ps(Mul00, Mul01);
00934         __m128 Add00 = _mm_add_ps(Sub00, Mul02);
00935         __m128 Inv0 = _mm_mul_ps(SignB, Add00);
00936 
00937         // col1
00938         // - (Vec0[0] * Fac0[0] - Vec2[0] * Fac3[0] + Vec3[0] * Fac4[0]),
00939         // + (Vec0[0] * Fac0[1] - Vec2[1] * Fac3[1] + Vec3[1] * Fac4[1]),
00940         // - (Vec0[0] * Fac0[2] - Vec2[2] * Fac3[2] + Vec3[2] * Fac4[2]),
00941         // + (Vec0[0] * Fac0[3] - Vec2[3] * Fac3[3] + Vec3[3] * Fac4[3]),
00942         __m128 Mul03 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec0, Fac0);
00943         __m128 Mul04 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec2, Fac3);
00944         __m128 Mul05 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec3, Fac4);
00945         __m128 Sub01 = _mm_sub_ps(Mul03, Mul04);
00946         __m128 Add01 = _mm_add_ps(Sub01, Mul05);
00947         __m128 Inv1 = _mm_mul_ps(SignA, Add01);
00948 
00949         // col2
00950         // + (Vec0[0] * Fac1[0] - Vec1[0] * Fac3[0] + Vec3[0] * Fac5[0]),
00951         // - (Vec0[0] * Fac1[1] - Vec1[1] * Fac3[1] + Vec3[1] * Fac5[1]),
00952         // + (Vec0[0] * Fac1[2] - Vec1[2] * Fac3[2] + Vec3[2] * Fac5[2]),
00953         // - (Vec0[0] * Fac1[3] - Vec1[3] * Fac3[3] + Vec3[3] * Fac5[3]),
00954         __m128 Mul06 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec0, Fac1);
00955         __m128 Mul07 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec1, Fac3);
00956         __m128 Mul08 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec3, Fac5);
00957         __m128 Sub02 = _mm_sub_ps(Mul06, Mul07);
00958         __m128 Add02 = _mm_add_ps(Sub02, Mul08);
00959         __m128 Inv2 = _mm_mul_ps(SignB, Add02);
00960 
00961         // col3
00962         // - (Vec1[0] * Fac2[0] - Vec1[0] * Fac4[0] + Vec2[0] * Fac5[0]),
00963         // + (Vec1[0] * Fac2[1] - Vec1[1] * Fac4[1] + Vec2[1] * Fac5[1]),
00964         // - (Vec1[0] * Fac2[2] - Vec1[2] * Fac4[2] + Vec2[2] * Fac5[2]),
00965         // + (Vec1[0] * Fac2[3] - Vec1[3] * Fac4[3] + Vec2[3] * Fac5[3]));
00966         __m128 Mul09 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec0, Fac2);
00967         __m128 Mul10 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec1, Fac4);
00968         __m128 Mul11 = _mm_mul_ps(Vec2, Fac5);
00969         __m128 Sub03 = _mm_sub_ps(Mul09, Mul10);
00970         __m128 Add03 = _mm_add_ps(Sub03, Mul11);
00971         __m128 Inv3 = _mm_mul_ps(SignA, Add03);
00972 
00973         __m128 Row0 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Inv0, Inv1, _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00974         __m128 Row1 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Inv2, Inv3, _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00975         __m128 Row2 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Row0, Row1, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 0, 2, 0));
00976 
00977         //      valType Determinant = m[0][0] * Inverse[0][0] 
00978         //                                              + m[0][1] * Inverse[1][0] 
00979         //                                              + m[0][2] * Inverse[2][0] 
00980         //                                              + m[0][3] * Inverse[3][0];
00981         __m128 Det0 = sse_dot_ps(in[0], Row2);
00982         __m128 Rcp0 = _mm_rcp_ps(Det0);
00983         //__m128 Rcp0 = _mm_div_ps(one, Det0);
00984         //      Inverse /= Determinant;
00985         out[0] = _mm_mul_ps(Inv0, Rcp0);
00986         out[1] = _mm_mul_ps(Inv1, Rcp0);
00987         out[2] = _mm_mul_ps(Inv2, Rcp0);
00988         out[3] = _mm_mul_ps(Inv3, Rcp0);
00989 }
00990 /*
00991 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER void sse_rotate_ps(__m128 const in[4], float Angle, float const v[3], __m128 out[4])
00992 {
00993         float a = glm::radians(Angle);
00994     float c = cos(a);
00995     float s = sin(a);
00996 
00997         glm::vec4 AxisA(v[0], v[1], v[2], float(0));
00998         __m128 AxisB = _mm_set_ps(AxisA.w, AxisA.z, AxisA.y, AxisA.x);
00999     __m128 AxisC = detail::sse_nrm_ps(AxisB);
01000 
01001         __m128 Cos0 = _mm_set_ss(c);
01002         __m128 CosA = _mm_shuffle_ps(Cos0, Cos0, _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
01003         __m128 Sin0 = _mm_set_ss(s);
01004         __m128 SinA = _mm_shuffle_ps(Sin0, Sin0, _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
01005 
01006         // detail::tvec3<T, P> temp = (valType(1) - c) * axis;
01007         __m128 Temp0 = _mm_sub_ps(one, CosA);
01008         __m128 Temp1 = _mm_mul_ps(Temp0, AxisC);
01009         
01010         //Rotate[0][0] = c + temp[0] * axis[0];
01011         //Rotate[0][1] = 0 + temp[0] * axis[1] + s * axis[2];
01012         //Rotate[0][2] = 0 + temp[0] * axis[2] - s * axis[1];
01013         __m128 Axis0 = _mm_shuffle_ps(AxisC, AxisC, _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
01014         __m128 TmpA0 = _mm_mul_ps(Axis0, AxisC);
01015         __m128 CosA0 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Cos0, Cos0, _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 1, 0));
01016         __m128 TmpA1 = _mm_add_ps(CosA0, TmpA0);
01017         __m128 SinA0 = SinA;//_mm_set_ps(0.0f, s, -s, 0.0f);
01018         __m128 TmpA2 = _mm_shuffle_ps(AxisC, AxisC, _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 1, 2, 3));
01019         __m128 TmpA3 = _mm_mul_ps(SinA0, TmpA2);
01020         __m128 TmpA4 = _mm_add_ps(TmpA1, TmpA3);
01021 
01022         //Rotate[1][0] = 0 + temp[1] * axis[0] - s * axis[2];
01023         //Rotate[1][1] = c + temp[1] * axis[1];
01024         //Rotate[1][2] = 0 + temp[1] * axis[2] + s * axis[0];
01025         __m128 Axis1 = _mm_shuffle_ps(AxisC, AxisC, _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 1, 1));
01026         __m128 TmpB0 = _mm_mul_ps(Axis1, AxisC);
01027         __m128 CosA1 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Cos0, Cos0, _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 0, 1));
01028         __m128 TmpB1 = _mm_add_ps(CosA1, TmpB0);
01029         __m128 SinB0 = SinA;//_mm_set_ps(-s, 0.0f, s, 0.0f);
01030         __m128 TmpB2 = _mm_shuffle_ps(AxisC, AxisC, _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 0, 3, 2));
01031         __m128 TmpB3 = _mm_mul_ps(SinA0, TmpB2);
01032         __m128 TmpB4 = _mm_add_ps(TmpB1, TmpB3);
01033 
01034     //Rotate[2][0] = 0 + temp[2] * axis[0] + s * axis[1];
01035     //Rotate[2][1] = 0 + temp[2] * axis[1] - s * axis[0];
01036     //Rotate[2][2] = c + temp[2] * axis[2];
01037         __m128 Axis2 = _mm_shuffle_ps(AxisC, AxisC, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 2));
01038         __m128 TmpC0 = _mm_mul_ps(Axis2, AxisC);
01039         __m128 CosA2 = _mm_shuffle_ps(Cos0, Cos0, _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 0, 1, 1));
01040         __m128 TmpC1 = _mm_add_ps(CosA2, TmpC0);
01041         __m128 SinC0 = SinA;//_mm_set_ps(s, -s, 0.0f, 0.0f);
01042         __m128 TmpC2 = _mm_shuffle_ps(AxisC, AxisC, _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 0, 1));
01043         __m128 TmpC3 = _mm_mul_ps(SinA0, TmpC2);
01044         __m128 TmpC4 = _mm_add_ps(TmpC1, TmpC3);
01045 
01046         __m128 Result[4];
01047         Result[0] = TmpA4;
01048         Result[1] = TmpB4;
01049         Result[2] = TmpC4;
01050         Result[3] = _mm_set_ps(1, 0, 0, 0);
01051 
01052         //detail::tmat4x4<valType> Result(detail::tmat4x4<valType>::_null);
01053         //Result[0] = m[0] * Rotate[0][0] + m[1] * Rotate[0][1] + m[2] * Rotate[0][2];
01054         //Result[1] = m[0] * Rotate[1][0] + m[1] * Rotate[1][1] + m[2] * Rotate[1][2];
01055         //Result[2] = m[0] * Rotate[2][0] + m[1] * Rotate[2][1] + m[2] * Rotate[2][2];
01056         //Result[3] = m[3];
01057         //return Result;
01058         sse_mul_ps(in, Result, out);
01059 }
01060 */
01061 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER void sse_outer_ps(__m128 const & c, __m128 const & r, __m128 out[4])
01062 {
01063         out[0] = _mm_mul_ps(c, _mm_shuffle_ps(r, r, _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0)));
01064         out[1] = _mm_mul_ps(c, _mm_shuffle_ps(r, r, _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 1, 1)));
01065         out[2] = _mm_mul_ps(c, _mm_shuffle_ps(r, r, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 2)));
01066         out[3] = _mm_mul_ps(c, _mm_shuffle_ps(r, r, _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 3, 3)));
01067 }
01068 
01069 }//namespace detail
01070 }//namespace glm
